titleStmt.title: Englands glory in her royall King, and honorable assembly in the high court of Parliament, above her former usurped lordly bishops synod. VVith a discourse betwixt Master Iohn Calvin, and a prelaticall bishop, whereunto is added the Bishop of Canterburies dreame.

notesStmt.note: Signatures: [A]¹ (=D2?) B⁴ [C]⁴ D² (-D2; = [A]1?). C2 signed A2.
Quire C, containing "The contrariety betweene Christs Apostles and lordly prelates" (caption title), is unsigned except for C2, signed "A2". Variant: A1 signed C.
The last leaf, "The report of the Bishop of Canterburies dreame ..", and quire B are filmed separately in that order on UMI microfilm reel 253:E.157:10.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
